description: 共同科英文（二）課程為一學期兩學分課程，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 1. 增進學生英語溝通表達能力 2. 透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神 3. 透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野 4. 透過課堂討論培養批判精神 5. 提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣

**Course Requirements:**

**Attendance and Participation 20%**

You are expected to work in pairs and in groups. Be a responsible partner. Finish what you need to finish before coming to the class.

Punctual attendance and active participation are required. If you are habitually late, points will be deducted. If you miss the class more than 4 times for no reasons, you will likely fail this course. If you have to miss a class, please inform me and your group partners in advance.

**Midterm: Presentation Project ABC 30%**

\*依據師大 3分鐘英語簡報競賽規則 ([https://ntnuengcompetition.weebly.com/](https://ntnuengcompetition.weebly.com/))

一、多元文化議題

二、校園生活議題

三、個人專業學習領域

四、好書分享

五、其他與學術相關議題

Here is what you need to do:

\[Part I\]

A. Oral Presentation: 3 minutes, memorized, 1 slide (no sound), videotaped

B. Written: presentation script + self-evaluation (typed, double-spaced hard copies)

C. Upload 4 digital files to Moodle:

File 1. Presentation script (in Word, File name: Your name\_script)

File 2. PowerPoint slide, in PPT (File name: Your name\_ppt)

File 3. Finalized presentation video for screening on assigned presentation session

\[Part II\] Oral Presentation on Stage

\*2019 Three-Minute Thesis Competition 三分鐘英語學術簡報競賽 (台大)

[https://www.awec.ntu.edu.tw/3mt/2019-3mt/#1574475376932-3798fcfa-72ca](https://www.awec.ntu.edu.tw/3mt/2019-3mt/#1574475376932-3798fcfa-72ca)

**Activities & Assignments ABC 20%**

1.  2 literature circle study journals: Submit a reading journal for each reading (Units 9 and 12). Typed, double-spaced, hard copy. The journal should include:

1\. Summary of the reading,

2\. Vocabulary and phrases (definition and example sentences, 10 items),

3\. One question that your group discussed (discussion question and your answer).

1.  Weekly reading journals: Read an article every week and submit a reading journal for each reading. The journal should include vocabulary and phrases (definition and example sentences, 10 items) and one question that you want to discuss (discussion question and your answer).
2.  Activity worksheets: e.g. Respond to your group’s weekly reading presentation.

\*Upload your journals to the moodle

**Group Work ABC 20%**

1.  Literature circle on 2 articles (Units 9 and 12)
2.  Weekly reading presentation to the group: Present your weekly reading journals to your group.
3.  Group presentation to the class: Your group needs to choose an article on any specific topic that your group members are all interested in. Read the article through and present it to the class. Your group presentation should include the article, your notes and explanation of the article, discussion questions, and your responses.

\*Quality Talk Introduction

**Lexile Reading Project Pre-Test 10% (Time:** **5/4 – 5/29)**
